data.text: Pen tepayaŋ nɨŋɨd nɨgɨnek, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak Sayon dum alaŋ jakɨl mɨdaknɨŋ, bɨ 144,000 okok ne ayɨp yelak. Bɨne ayɨp yelak anɨb okok, nebeŋ kɨli alaŋ mɨdupsek yɨb ne ak sek, Nap yɨb ak sek tɨk lel yek.

14.2 Ese 1.24, 43.2, Lep 1.15, 5.8, 19.6 Pen takaw olap, God man ne alaŋ nɨb ñɨg sɨj awl puŋɨl gu agup tek akaŋ, tɨmuk gu palsek agup tek ak agek nɨgɨnek. Takaw tep anɨb ak, gita pakɨpal agup tek ak agak.

14.3 Sng 149.1, Ais 42.10, Lep 5.9, 7.4, 15.3 Pen bɨ 144,000 okok, kɨli bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdep ak sek, tap kɨm mɨdep omɨŋal omɨŋal okok sek, bɨawl anep 24 okok sek, kɨlop dɨ nab lɨl, kɨmep kɨdeyɨl olap agɨlak. Kɨmep anɨb ak, binɨb lum awl nɨb yokɨp okok nɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lak. Bɨ 144,000 God dak anɨb okok nep nɨgɨnɨgel tek lak.

14.4 2 Ko 11.2, Epe 5.27, Jem 1.18, Lep 3.4, 5.9 Bɨ anɨb okok nɨm, kɨli bin ayɨp ma kɨnɨlak gach ma gak.14.4 Glik takaw anɨb agup, kɨli bin ayɨp ma kɨnɨlak. Pen bɨ gos nɨgep kuŋay kɨli anɨgɨl apal, Takaw anɨb ak pal adaŋ lɨl apal. Takaw jɨj ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb, binbɨ kɨli God gos ne nɨgup ak nep kɨdek gɨl, tap tɨmel ogɨnap ma gɨl gɨpal.  Mɨdtep gɨl suŋtep mɨdebal. Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak ayɨp nep ajebal. Bɨ anɨb okok, God ne binɨb yokɨp nab okok nɨb kɨlop dak. God ne ned nep kɨlop aglɨl adɨkɨd dak. Anɨb ak tek, kɨli God ayɨp Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ayɨp yenɨgabal.
14.5 Sng 32.2, Sef 3.13, Epe 5.27 Takaw yepɨs ogɨnap ma apal. God takaw nɨŋɨd ne ak kɨdek gɨl suŋtep mɨdebal.

Pen tepayaŋ nɨŋɨd nɨgɨnek, ensel olap wɨsɨp nab sɨŋalaŋ wɨŋɨd ajɨlɨg, God takaw teplep pel yenɨgab ak, binɨb lum awl kɨlop agñɨnɨg gak. Binɨb man keke mɨdebal tek, jɨj keke mɨdebal tek, takaw yɨbɨl keke apal tek, wak keke lup tek,

14.7 Neh 9.6, Sng 124.8, Apo 17.24, Lep 10.6, 15.4 kɨlop suk awl agɨl agak, God ne binɨb lum awl kɨlop yɨg lɨnɨgab ñɨn ak owup tek, God nop pɨlɨkɨl agnɨŋɨd gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbi ne Bɨawl wɨsɨp alaŋ, lum awl, ñɨg solwala, ñɨg kɨlam jup okok mɨdupsek gɨlak agɨl, yɨb nop dad aplanɨmɨb agak.

Ensel olap, ensel ned ak nop kɨdek gɨlɨg agak, God gek man awl Babilon pɨsnep apyap pakup o, pɨsnep apyap pakup o agak. Man awl anɨb ak ne bin tɨmel, pel bɨ si dup agak. Pen ñɨg wayn kɨles ne ñɨŋub ak, binɨb man keke okok kɨlop ñek ñɨbel, ne gup tek kɨli abe sawl yɨbɨl gɨpal agak.

Ensel olap pen, ensel ned omɨŋal ak kɨlop kɨdek gɨl, suk awl agɨl agak, Binɨb tap ladek yɨb nop dad aplanɨlɨg, kawnan nop tek nɨŋɨd gɨlɨlak ak yɨb nop dad aplanɨlɨg, kɨjɨkɨl ne ak nebeŋ alaŋ tɨkak akaŋ, ñɨn adek sɨŋak tɨkak okok,

14.10 Stt 19.24, Sng 11.6, 75.8, Ais 51.17, Jer 25.15, Ese 38.22, Lep 15.7, 16.19, 18.6, 19.20, 20.10, 21.8 God kɨlop nɨŋɨd nop mɨlɨk yɨbɨl yownɨgab agak. Yapek, ñɨg wayn sɨlek yɨbɨl ak, kɨnag kɨlop ayaŋ pagek aplan jakek, ñek ñɨnɨgabal agak. Ñɨg wayn sɨlek anɨb ak, God mɨlɨk yownɨgab ak agak. Ensel suŋtep ne okok sek, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak sek nɨg yelaknɨŋ, kɨlop mab yɨneb ak agyokek, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ kab salpa sek ak kɨlop yɨnaknɨŋ wɨg pak yenɨgabal agak.

14.11 Ais 34.10, Lep 13.12-17, 19.3 Mab sɨkom anɨb ak pel pelnep aplanɨgab agak. Anɨb ak, binɨb tap ladek yɨb nop dad aplanɨlɨg, kawnan nop tek nɨŋɨd gɨlɨlak ak yɨb nop dad aplanɨlɨg, kɨjɨkɨl ne tɨkak ak dɨlak okok, God kɨlop pen yul awl ak subnab maynab ayaŋ ñɨnɨgab agak.
14.12 Lep 12.17, 13.10 Anɨgɨnɨgab tek, binɨb God yɨl mɨdebal kɨli God agup tek gɨlɨg, Jisas nop nokom gos lɨnepal okok, kɨlopapɨl chɨg tep gɨl mɨdɨlɨg nɨm, gel amnɨmuŋ agak.

Pen takaw olap, God man ne alaŋ nɨb yɨp agak, Takaw agɨnɨgebin awl tɨk lɨnɨmɨn agak. Mɨñɨl abe kɨdek abe, binɨb bɨawl nop chɨgɨl kumnɨgabal okok, kɨlop tep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agak. Agek, God Kawnan ne ak agak, Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agak. Kɨli gɨtep gɨlɨg wog koslam gɨpal tek, God nɨgup ak nɨm, ne agek am añɨŋ lɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg yenɨgabal agak.
Pen nɨgɨnek, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne tek ak, wɨsɨp kayɨg bad adek ak besɨg yek. Bɨ anɨb ak, gol dɨl gɨlak nag ak kɨmɨg cheg lɨl, tu gogeb kɨd tɨmel tap mɨdup tɨk dad opal tek olap dɨ yek.

Pen ensel olap God man ne alaŋ mɨdɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl mɨgan nɨb seŋ apɨl, bɨ wɨsɨp nab sɨŋak besɨg yek anop, suk awl agɨl agak, Lum ayaŋ tap mɨdup okok mɨdupsek pok gup agak. Tap mɨdup tɨk dad owep ñɨn ak owup tek, tu nad anɨb ak dɨl, tɨkɨnɨmɨn agak.
Agek, bɨ wɨsɨp nab sɨŋak besɨg yek ak, tu gogeb ne ak dɨl, tap mɨdup lum awl okok mɨdupsek tɨkak.
Ensel olap pen, tu gogeb kɨd tɨmel olap dɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl mɨgan nɨb seŋ owak.

Won anɨb ak nep, ensel mab mɨŋɨlaŋ kod yolɨgup ak, God nop sɨbogep abañ adek ak nɨb owak. Apɨl, ensel tu gogeb kɨd tɨmel olap dek anop suk awl agɨl agak, Wayn mɨdup lum awl nɨb okok pok gup tek, mɨdupsek tɨk dap nan gɨnɨmɨn agak.

14.19 Lep 19.15 Anɨb agek, ensel anɨb ak tu gogeb ne ak dɨl, wayn mɨdup okok tɨk dam, wayn mɨdup taw chɨb jakɨnɨg gup kab kɨwok mɨgan ak yokak. Pen kab kɨwok mɨgan takaw anɨb ak, takaw paladaŋ lɨl agɨl, God mɨlɨk yowak ak agak.

Mɨgan anɨb ak yokek taw chɨb jakak, man awl gol okok. Jakaknɨŋ, nɨkɨm ak tan aplan jakɨl, ñɨg wɨlɨk awl apyowup tek wu agɨl apyapɨlɨg, 300 kilomita tek amnak. Pen nab sɨŋak aplanak, mita omɨŋal tek aplanak.
